title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the bacon in a pan.
Whisk the eggs with Parmesan cheese.
Combine everything and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and spices.
Prepare the gravy by frying onions and adding spices.
Add cream and simmer the chicken in the sauce.
